short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily capture screenshots as you watch videos online, add professional annotations for each frame and organize them into a shotlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Storyonboards Chrome extension is designed to elevate your movie and video-watching experience. With Storyonboards, capturing memorable movie scenes has never been easier. Whether you're analyzing films for study, creating a storyboard for your own project, or simply collecting your favorite scenes, this tool is here to assist you every step of the way.

What can Storyonboards Chrome extension do for you?

1. Effortless Screen Capturing
While watching videos on your favorite websites, you can now capture any scene with just a click. No need for complex software or tedious processes.

2. Organized Excel Lists
Every captured scene is automatically listed and organized into an Excel document.This feature allows you to edit, annotate, and share your captures with ease, creating a storyboard-like experience.

3. Solve Your Challenges
Save Time : Instantly capture and organize key scenes without interrupting your viewing experience.
Increase Efficiency : Perfect for students, educators, filmmakers, and designers who need to analyze or catalog film content.
Enhance Creativity : Create visual storyboards effortlessly, aiding in project development and presentations.
